````{r, setup, include=FALSE}
library(rugarch)
````

```{r}
setwd("..")
sp<-read.csv("Data/sp500.csv")
ny<-read.csv("Data/nyse.csv")
nas<-read.csv("Data/nasdaq.csv")

sp_logret <- diff(log(sp$spindx))
ny_logret <- diff(log(ny$spindx))
nas_logret <- diff(log(nas$ncindx))
```

```{r}
test <- ugarchspec(variance.model=list(garchOrder=c(1,1)), mean.model=list(armaOrder=c(1,1)), distribution.model = "std")

sp_test=ugarchfit(spec=test, data=sp_logret)
sp_test
```
